input.sentences: there was a party outside of the bar .
a lot of people were also trying to get inside the bar .
they had a lot of drinks .
after the party a lot of people went home and went straight to sleep .
output.sentences: Friday night was always party night at the bar.
There were a lot of people inside, it was standing room only.
Joe and Mary pushed their way in and took a photo as a couple to post on Instagram.
They had a lot of drinks and laughed all night.
When the bar closed at 2:00 AM, all the people, including Joe, went home and straight to sleep.
